name: Great Knight of the Red Lotus
desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or GY) by shuffling up to 3 non-Effect Monsters from your GY into the Deck/Extra Deck. 
You can only Special Summon "Great Knight of the Red Lotus" once per turn this way.
①：Gains 800 ATK for each Normal Monster shuffled into the Deck for its Special Summon.
②：Once per turn: You can target 1 monster on the field and 1 non-Effect Monster in your GY; destroy the first target, and if you do, Special Summon the second target.

name: Goddess of Duality
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 monster from your Deck to your hand with a coin tossing effect, except "Goddess of Duality".
②：During your Main Phase: You can toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, the ATK of all face-up monsters you currently control become doubled until the end of this turn. If you call it wrong, send as many monsters you control as possible to the GY, and if you do, draw 1 card.

name: Lightstorm Dragon
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned: You can target Spells/Traps on the field up to the number of Normal Monsters in your GY +1; destroy them.
②：If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 Spell/Trap in your GY; Set it, but it cannot be activated unless you control a Normal Monster.

name: He Arkho – "Hudor"
desc:
You can only use 1 of the ① and ② effect of this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：Target 1 monster in either GY; destroy 1 WATER monster its owner controls, and if you do, Special Summon that target to that player's field in Defense Position.
②：If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish it, then target 1 WATER monster in either GY; destroy 1 monster its owner controls, and if you do, Special Summon that target to that player's field in Defense Position.

name: Double Wild
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：Target 1 Level 5 or lower monster you control; you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, except monsters with the same original Type as that target, also add 1 Level 10 monster with that original Type from your Deck to your hand, then you can discard 1 card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 monster with that Type from your hand in Defense Position.

name: A-Bao A Qu, the Lightless Shadow
desc:
2+ monsters, including a Fiend monster
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card to activate 1 of these effects;
● Destroy 1 card on the field.
● Banish this card (until the End Phase), and if you do, Special Summon 1 LIGHT or DARK monster from your GY.
②：During your Standby Phase: You can draw cards equal to the number of different Types among the monsters in your GY, then place the same number of cards from your hand on the bottom of the Deck in any order.

name: Clockwork Knight
desc:
1 non-Link Machine monster with 1000 or less original ATK
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Link Summoned: You can send 1 face-up Continuous Spell you control to the GY; add 1 "Clockwork Night" from your Deck to your hand.
②：You can target 1 Machine monster with 1000 or less ATK in your GY; Tribute 1 other Machine monster, and if you do, Special Summon the targeted monster in Defense Position.

name: Delta of Temptation
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name once per turn. 
You can only use ② and ③ effects of this card's name once per turn.
①：When this card resolves, you can send 1 Level 5 or higher Zombie monster from your Deck to the GY.
②：If a Zombie monster is on the field: You can Special Summon 1 "Delta Token" (Zombie/DARK/Level 5/ATK 0/DEF 0).
③：If a monster(s) is added from the GY to the hand while this card is in your GY: You can add this card to your hand.

name: Liberator Etho
desc:
(Note: temporarily unavailable)

Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or GY) by paying half your LP while your opponent has a Monster Card on their field or in their GY with an effect that can activate in the hand and/or Monster Zone, but activates in response to the activation of a card or effect to do so. You can only Special Summon "Liberator Etho" once per turn this way.
①：This card's Special Summon cannot be negated.
②：This card in the Monster Zone cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon, also it is unaffected by monster effects activated on your opponent's field during your turn only.

name: Mulcharmy Nyalus
desc:
You can only activate 1 other "Mulcharmy" monster effect, the turn you activate this effect.
①：If you control no cards (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; apply these effects this turn.
● Each time your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) from the GY and/or banishment, immediately draw 1 card.
● Once, during this End Phase, if the number of cards in your hand is more than the number of cards your opponent controls +6, you must randomly shuffle cards from your hand into the Deck so the number in your hand equals the number your opponent controls +6.

name: Arcana Force V – The Hierophant
desc:
①：You can discard this card; for the rest of this turn, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects when an "Arcana Force" monster(s) is Summoned to your field.
②：If this card is Summoned: Toss a coin.
● Heads: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Arcana Force" monster from your Deck with a different name from the monsters you control and in your GY.
● Tails: Special Summon 1 "Arcana Force" monster from your Deck to your opponent's field.

name: Arcana Force XIX – The Sun
desc:
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If a card that has a coin tossing effect is on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Summoned: Toss a coin.
● Heads: Set 1 Spell that has a coin tossing effect from your Deck.
● Tails: Destroy all cards in the Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Gladiator Beast Magister
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card and 1 other "Gladiator Beast" monster in your hand; Special Summon both.
②：If this card is Special Summoned by a "Gladiator Beast" monster's effect: You can add 1 "Gladiator" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
③：At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card battled: You can shuffle it into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Magister".

name: Test Bear
desc:
You can only Special Summon this card by ① effect once per turn.
You can only use ② effect once per turn.
①：If you control a "Gladiator Beast" monster Special Summoned from the Deck or Extra Deck, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).
②：You can Tribute this card and shuffle 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your hand or face-up field into the Deck/Extra Deck; Special Summon up to 2 "Gladiator Beast" monsters from your Deck. (This is treated as a Special Summon by a "Gladiator Beast" monster's effect.)

name: Hallo the Great Spirit of Tricks
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can make your opponent choose 1 of these effects for you to apply. You must control this face-up card to activate and to resolve this effect.
● This card gains 800 ATK for each Fiend monster in your GY.
● Inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Fiend monster in your GY.
②：If this card is destroyed by battle or effect: You can send 1 monster your opponent controls to the GY.

name: Ween the Great Spirit of Treats
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can make your opponent choose 1 of these effects for you to apply. You must control this face-up card to activate and to resolve this effect.
● This card gains 800 ATK for each Zombie monster in your GY.
● Inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Zombie monster in your GY.
②：If this card is destroyed by battle or effect: You can Special Summon 1 monster from your opponent's GY to your field.

name: Arcana Force EX – The Chaos Ruler
desc:
3 "Arcana Force" monsters with different names.
Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by sending the above cards from either field to the GY.
①：If this card is Special Summoned: Toss a coin.
● Heads: Special Summon 1 Level 10 "Arcana Force" monster from your hand or Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions.
● Tails: Add 1 card that has a coin tossing effect from your Deck to your hand.
②：Your opponent cannot activate monster effects on the field while "Light Barrier" is in the Field Zone.

name: Gladiator Beast Claudius
desc:
5 "Gladiator Beast" monsters
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by shuffling the above cards from your field and/or GY into the Deck/Extra Deck.
①：If Summoned this way: You can conduct your next Battle Phase twice.
②：Once per turn, if your opponent activates a monster effect: You can activate this effect based on whose turn it is;
● Yours: Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck.
● Your opponent's: Special Summon 1 Level 11 or lower "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Extra Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions.

name: Gladiator Beast Dareios
desc:
2 monsters, including a "Gladiator Beast" monster
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Link Summoned: You can activate this effect; you cannot use monsters as Link Material for the rest of this turn, except "Gladiator Beast" monsters, also Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Gladiator Beast" monster from your hand or GY, or, if your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck instead.
②："Gladiator Beast" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects during your opponent's Battle Phase.

name: The Wave of Light
desc:
You can only use ③ effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：During your Standby Phase, if you do not have "Light Barrier" in your Field Zone: Toss a coin, and if the result is tails, this card's ② and ③ effect are negated until your next Standby Phase.
②：Fairy monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF.
③：You can discard 1 card; add 2 "Arcana Force" monsters with different names from each other from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except "Arcana Force" monsters.

name: Arcana Spread
desc:
You can only use either ① or ② effects of this card's name once per turn, and only once that turn.
①：Toss a coin and apply this effect. If "Light Barrier" is in your Field Zone, you choose the effect instead.
● Heads: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Arcana Force" monster from your Deck.
● Tails: Special Summon 1 monster from your GY that has a coin tossing effect.
②：You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 card from your GY to your hand that has a coin tossing effect.

name: Flavius – Arena of the Gladiator Beasts
desc:
You can only use ①, ② and ③ effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck to your hand.
②：When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, and if you do, it cannot be destroyed by battle.
③：During the End Phase, if a "Gladiator Beast" monster(s) was Special Summoned from your Deck this turn: You can Set 1 "Gladiator" Trap from your Deck.

name: Trick or Treat!
desc: ①：Add 1 "Hallo the Great Spirit of Tricks" or "Ween the Great Spirit of Treats" from your Deck or GY to your hand.

name: Six Strike – Legendary Lord's Sextuple Impact
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control 3 or more "Six Samurai" Synchro Monsters with different names (1 less for every 6 Bushido Counters on cards you control): Destroy all cards your opponent controls.
②：If this Set card is destroyed, or banished, by an opponent's activated card or effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Six Samurai" monster or "Shien" Effect Monster from your Deck or Extra Deck.

name: Galatea-i, the Orcust Automaton
desc:
1 "Orcust" or "World Legacy" monster
You can only Link Summon "Galatea-i, the Orcust Automaton(s)" once per turn. Cannot be used as material for an Xyz Summon. 
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; add 1 "World Legacy" monster or "Orcustrated Babel" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
②：If this card is in your GY: You can banish 1 other "Orcust" card from your GY; Special Summon this card.

name: Enlilgirsu, the Orcust Mekk-Knight
desc:
2+ monsters, including an "Orcust" Link Monster
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can target 1 of your banished "Orcust" or "World Legacy" cards; add it to your hand, then you can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck to take control of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.
②：If this card is in your GY because it was sent there from the Extra Monster Zone this turn: You can banish it; send 1 card on the field to the GY.

name: Gem-Knight Master Diamond Dispersion
desc:
3 "Gem-" monsters
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon up to 3 non-Rock "Gem-" monsters with different names from your Extra Deck and/or GY, ignoring their Summoning conditions, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Fusion Monsters.
②：When your "Gem-Knight" Fusion Monster is destroyed by battle while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card.

name: Gem-Knight Nepyrim
desc:
You can only use ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Gem-Knight" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Gem-Knight Nepyrim", also any effect damage your opponent takes during the Main Phase for the rest of this turn is halved.
②：During your Main Phase, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Gem-" monster.
③：If this card is sent from the hand or Deck to the GY: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card.

name: Gem-Knight Hollowcore
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can send 1 "Gem-Knight" Normal Monster or "Gem-Knight Fusion" from your Deck to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position.
②：When your opponent activates a card or effect and you control a "Gem-Knight" Fusion Monster (Quick Effect): You can banish 3 "Gem-Knight" cards from your GY, including this card; negate that effect, then all "Gem-Knight" monsters you currently control gain 1000 ATK.

name: Gem-Knight Dispersion
Primite Another Beryl
desc:
You can only use ② and ③ effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Set 1 "Primite" Spell/Trap from your Deck.
②：You can Tribute this card; send 1 Normal Monster from your Deck to the GY.
③：During your Standby Phase, if you have a Normal Monster on your field or in your GY: You can add this card from your GY to your hand.

name: Primite Resounding Reaction
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effects effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：When your opponent would Normal or Special Summon a monster(s) while you control a Normal Monster or a Level 5 or higher "Primite" monster, except a Token: Negate the Summon, and if you do, banish that monster(s).
②：During your Standby Phase, if you control a "Primite" monster: You can Set this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field.

name: Metal Flame Swordsman
desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned with "Max Metalmorph" that was activated by Tributing a Level 5 or higher Warrior monster. 
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card in your hand; add 1 card that mentions "Max Metalmorph" from your Deck to your hand, except "Metal Flame Swordsman", and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck.
②：Each time your opponent activates a card or effect, this card gains 300 ATK, and if it does, inflict 500 damage to them.

name: Flame Metalmorph
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：Tribute 1 face-up monster that mentions "Max Metalmorph"; Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set and mentions "Max Metalmorph", ignoring its Summoning conditions, then you can equip this card to it as an Equip Card with this effect.
● If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can send this card to the GY instead.

name: Queen of the Azamina
desc:
This card is always treated as a "Sinful Spoils" card. 
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is sent to the GY, or banished, from your hand or field by an activated card or effect: You can Special Summon this card.
②：When your "Azamina" or "White Forest" monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can target 1 "Sinful Spoils" Spell/Trap in your GY; add it to your hand.

name: Snake-Eyes Damned Dragon
desc:
1 "Snake-Eye" monster + 1 Illusion monster
Must be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by sending 2 face-up Monster Cards from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY. 
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; place it face-up in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell.

name: St. Azamina
desc:
1 Level 6 or higher Fusion Monster + 1 Level 6 or higher Synchro monster
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：Your opponent cannot target this card, cards they control, and cards in their GY and banishment with card effects, also they take any battle damage you would have taken instead.
②：If this card was Fusion Summoned this turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 Level 9 or lower "Azamina" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck.

name: Kick-Ass Goblin Bikers
desc:
2+ Level 6 monsters
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can target face-up monsters your opponent controls up to the number of "Goblin" monsters you control; detach 1 Xyz Material from your monster, and if you do, attach those targets to this card as material.
②：During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can target cards your opponent controls up to the number of "Goblin" Xyz Monsters you control; detach 3 Xyz Materials from your monsters, and if you do, send those targets to the GY.

name: Azamina Unleashing
desc:
This card is always treated as a "White Forest" card. 
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Target cards on the field up to the number of Fusion and Synchro Monsters (Fiend, Illusion, and Spellcaster) you control and in your GY; return them to the hand.
②：If this card is sent to the GY to activate a monster effect: You can Set this card.

name: Azamina Elzette of the White Forest
desc:
You can only use ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon 1 "White Forest" or "Azamina" monster from your hand.
②：During your Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Azamina" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material.
③：If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can add 1 "Sinful Spoils" card from your Deck to your hand.

name: Sinful Spoils of the White Forest
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control a Fiend, Illusion, or Spellcaster monster: Activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon 1 Fiend, Illusion, or Spellcaster monster from your hand.
● Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material.
②：If this card is sent to the GY to activate a monster effect: You can Set this card.

name: Play the Diabell
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If a Spell(s)/Trap(s) is sent to the GY to activate a card or effect: Send 1 Illusion or Spellcaster monster from your hand, Deck, or Extra Deck to the GY.
②：During your Main Phase: You can banish 3 Spells/Traps from your GY, including this card; Special Summon 1 "Diabell" monster from your hand or GY.

name: Like the Diabell
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If a Spell(s)/Trap(s) is sent to the GY by a card effect: Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand or GY, but it cannot be activated this turn.
②：During your Main Phase: You can banish 3 Spells/Traps from your GY, including this card; Special Summon 1 "Diabell" monster from your hand or GY.

name: Sinful Spoils Awakening
desc:
You can only use ① or ② effect of this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：If you control a Level 5 or higher Illusion monster and your opponent controls 3 or more monsters: Target up to 3 cards they control; return them to the hand.
②：If you control a Level 5 or higher Illusion monster and this card is in your GY: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field.

name: Jet Shark
desc:
You can only use ② or ③ effect of this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：If a WATER Xyz Monster is on the field, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon "Jet Shark" for the rest of this turn.
②：During your Main Phase: You can send 1 Fish "Shark" monster or 1 "Xyz" Spell/Trap from your Deck to the GY.
③：You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Aqua Jet" card from your Deck or GY to your hand.

name: Poseidra, the Rumbling Atlantean
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can send 1 other WATER monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Atlantean" or "Mermail" monster from your Deck to the GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls; return it to the hand.
③：Your opponent's monsters cannot target this card for attacks while you control a monster other than "Poseidra the Rumbling Atlantean".

name: Abysstrite, the Atlantean Spirit
desc:
2+ Level 7 WATER monsters
You can only use ① and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 Level 7 or lower Fish, Sea Serpent, or Aqua monster in your GY; Special Summon it.
②：WATER monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF for each material attached to this card.
③：You can detach 1 material from this card; Set 1 "Abyss-" Trap from your Deck.

name: Abyss-Team
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Draw cards equal to the number of different Types among Fish, Sea Serpent, and Aqua monsters you control, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck until the end of your next turn after this card resolves, except WATER monsters.
②：If a face-up WATER monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card; add 1 "Mermail" monster from your GY or banishment to your hand.

name: Tenyi Spirit – Surya
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control a Wyrm monster or a non-Effect Monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material for a Wyrm monster: You can Special Summon 1 "Tenyi" Link Monster from your Extra Deck (it cannot be used as Link Material), then you lose LP equal to its Link Rating x 1000.

name: Tenyi Spirit – Mula Adhara
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned and you have 2 or more Wyrm monsters in your GY and/or banishment: You can add 1 Field Spell from your Deck to your hand.
②：This card gains these effects while there is a non-Effect Monster on the field.
● Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
● Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects.
● Can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.

name: Eternal Perfection of the Tenyi
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn. 
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：When this card resolves, you can add 1 "Vessel for the Dragon Cycle" or "Heavenly Dragon Circle" from your Deck to your hand.
②：You can Tribute 1 Wyrm monster, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.
③：Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can send this card to the GY, and if you do, place 1 "Flawless Perfection of the Tenyi" from your Deck or GY face-up in your Field Zone.

name: Double Fusion
desc: ①：Pay 500 LP; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material, then you can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material.

name: Materiactor Exarept
desc:
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card in your hand and discard 1 other card; add 1 Level 3 Normal Monster from your Deck or GY to your hand, except the discarded card, then Special Summon this card in Defense Position.
②：(Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 Rank 3 Xyz Monster you control; it gains 1500 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Materiactor Zeptowing
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If you control a "Materiactor" card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, or flipped face-up: You can add 1 "Materiactor" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Materiactor Zeptowing", then you can take 1 Level 3 Normal Monster from your GY, and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it.

name: Materiactor Exagard
desc:
2+ Level 3 monsters
You can only use ① and ② effects of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can detach 1 material from this card; from your Deck, either Special Summon 1 "Materiactor" monster, or add 1 "Materiactor" Spell/Trap to your hand.
②：If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s): You can add up to 2 cards attached to this card as material to your hand, including a "Materiactor" card, then, if you have a Normal Monster(s) in your GY, you can return 1 card on the field to the hand.

name: Materiactor Meltdown
desc:
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can excavate the top 6 cards of your Deck, you can add 1 excavated "Materiactor" card to your hand, also place the rest on the top of the Deck in any order, then you can add 1 card attached to your Rank 3 Xyz Monster as material to your hand.
②：If your Xyz Monster's effect is activated: You can attach the top card of your Deck to 1 of your "Materiactor" Xyz Monsters as material.

name: Materiactor Critical
desc:
You can only use a card with this card's name once per turn.
①：When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated: Add 1 card attached to your "Materiactor" Xyz Monster as material to your hand, and if you do, negate the activation, then apply this effect based on the added card's type.
● Monster: Place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.
● Spell: All "Materiactor" Xyz Monsters you currently control gain 1000 ATK.
● Trap: You can Set the added card.

name: Dark Sea Serpent – Dryagle
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you have 3 or more Level 10 monsters on your field, GY, and/or banishment: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY; this card gains 500 ATK, then, if the sent card was a monster, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. Otherwise, you can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.

name: Template Skipper
desc:
You can only Special Summon with ① effect of this card's name once per turn. 
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to your zone a Cyberse Link Monster points to.
②：During your Main Phase: You can banish 1 Cyberse monster from your hand or GY, and if you do, when you Link Summon this turn, you can treat this card as Link Material with the same name as the banished monster.

name: Twins of the Eclipse
desc:
2 Level 4 monsters
For this card's Xyz Summon, you can treat Rank 4 monsters you control as Level 4 monsters for material. 
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can detach 1 material from this card; this card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase this turn.
②：If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 2 other Rank 4 or lower Xyz Monsters in your GY; Special Summon 1 of them, and if you do, attach the other to it as material.

name: Tempura of Chance – EBI
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 8
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use ① the Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can target 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; toss a coin once and apply the following effect based on the result.
● Heads：Special Summon that card.
● Tails：Destroy it, and if you do, you lose LP equal to its Pendulum Scale x 300.
----------------------------------------
[ Flavor Text ]
Went to EDO-FRONT, which is the talk of town. 
The Tempura here is not only massive in Scale, but its beautiful appearance has also earned it the nickname "Kinpura".
Although the port is filled with the latest state-of-the-art facilities and has a cross-cultural feel to it, the air is filled with a rich aroma that evokes a certain sense of nostalgia, and the occasional crackling and popping sound echoes through the air, lifting one's spirits.
Although I had long awaited this Tempura, the rough conditions in the surrounding airspace meant it could not enter the port today.
Due to my poor luck, I had to hand in a practically blank report.
It's really regrettable as I've been looking forward to this for over a year but I think at the end of the day I'll give this 3 stars.

name: Supply Soldier of the Indestructible Insects
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of "Supply Soldier of the Indestructible Insects" once per turn.
①：When an Insect monster's effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then if you activated this effect in response to your opponent's effect activation, negate that effect, also until the end of your next turn, after this effect resolves, you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck, except Insect monsters. 
②：During your Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 Insect Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field.

name: Heavy Cavalry of the Indestructible Insects
desc:
1 Level 5 or higher Insect monster + 1 Insect monster
You can only use ② effect of "Heavy Cavalry of the Indestructible Insects" once per turn.
①：Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. 
②：If all face-up monsters you control are Insect monsters (Quick Effect): You can target 2 monsters on the field, including an Insect monster you control; banish them.

name: Insect Invitation
desc:
You can only use ② and ③ effect of "Insect Invitation" once per turn. 
①：Face-up monsters your opponent controls that were not Summoned this turn become Insect. 
②：You can target 3 of your banished Insect monsters; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card. 
③：During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there from the hand this turn: You can place this card face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: Mantman the Ultrahuman
desc:
You can only use ② and ③  effects of "Mantman the Ultrahuman" once per turn. 
①：Cannot be Tributed, or destroyed by battle, while face-up on the field. 
②：If your opponent controls a face-up card you own: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. 
③：During the End Phase, if this card was Normal or Special Summon this turn: You can place this card on the bottom of the Deck, then you can return 1 face-up card on the field you own to your hand.

name: Phalaenop Sisters
desc:
You can only ① this effect of "Phalaenop Sisters" once per turn.
①：If the total Levels of monsters you control are less than or equal to the total Levels of monsters your opponent controls: You can Tribute this card; add 1 Level 7 or higher Insect or Plant monster from your Deck to your hand. During the End Phase of this turn, take 2700 damage if you did not Normal or Special Summon the added monster, or a card with the same original name, after activating this effect.

name: Release Brainwashing
desc:
You can only activate 1 "Release Brainwashing" per turn.
①：If a monster(s) is Tributed from the hand or field (except during the Damage Step): Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; apply the following effect, based on which player owns that face-up monster.
• You: Take control of it, but return it to the hand during the End Phase.
• Your opponent: Negate its effects until the end of this turn.

name: Denial Deity Dotan
desc:
1 LIGHT monster + 2 monsters, except on the field or in the GY
①：This Fusion Summoned card cannot be destroyed by battle. 
②：As long as no monsters on your field or GY share an original name with any monster on your opponent's field or GY, monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects. 
③：You can send from your hand, Deck or Extra Deck to the GY, 1 monster with the same original name as a monster on your opponent's field or GY, then target 1 card on their field or GY; banish it.

name: Butterfly Fish
desc:
You can only use ① or ②  effect "Butterfly Fish" per turn, and only once that turn. 
You cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck, except WATER monsters, the turn you activate either of this card's effects.
①：If this card is sent to the GY to activate a monster effect: You can add this card to your hand. 
②：If a monster(s) is sent to your GY, except by battle, while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can discard 1 card to the GY; Special Summon this card.

name: QQ Enneagon
desc:
You can only use ① effect of "QQ Eenagon" once per turn. 
①：If this card is in your hand or GY: You can reveal 1 Level 9 monster in your hand, except "QQ Eenagon"; Special Summon both this card and the revealed monster in Defense Position, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck, except Rank 9 or higher Xyz Monsters. 
②：A Rank 9 or higher Xyz Monster that has this card as material gains this effect.
• This card gains 900 ATK/DEF.

name: Fiendsmith's Rex Tremendae
desc:
1 "Fiendsmith" Fusion Monster + 1 Fusion or Link Monster
You can only use ① and ③ effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can discard 1 card; send 1 LIGHT Fiend monster from your Deck or Extra Deck to the GY.
②：Unaffected by non-"Fiendsmith" cards' effects while equipped with a "Fiendsmith" Equip Spell.
③：If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 other "Fiendsmith" card in your GY or banishment; add it to your hand.

name: Fiendsmith's Kyrie
desc:
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：This turn, your LIGHT Fiend monsters cannot be destroyed by battle, also any battle damage you take is halved.
②：You can banish this card from your GY; Fusion Summon 1 "Fiendsmith" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters you control as material. You can also use monsters in your Spell & Trap Zone equipped to a "Fiendsmith" monster as Equip Spells.

name: Mimighoul Fairy
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of "Mimighoul Fairy" once per turn.
①：FLIP: If it is the Main Phase: Apply these effects in sequence.
• This turn you cannot activate the effects of monsters Special Summoned from your hand.
• Give control of this card to your opponent.
②：During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand to your opponent's field in face-down Defense Position, or if you control a "Mimighoul" monster, you can Special Summon this card face-up on your field.

name: Mimighoul Slime
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of "Mimighoul Slime" once per turn.
①：FLIP: If it is the Main Phase: Apply these effects in sequence.
• Your opponent can Special Summon 1 "Mimighoul" monster from their Deck to their field.
• Give control of this card to your opponent.
②：During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand to your opponent's field in face-down Defense Position, or if your opponent controls more monsters than you do, you can Special Summon this card face-up on your field.

name: Giant Mimighoul
desc:
2 Level 1 monsters
You can only use ② and ③ effect of "Giant Mimighoul" once per turn. 
①：Your non-Xyz "Mimighoul" monsters can attack directly while your opponent controls a face-down monster. 
②：If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can add 1 "Mimighoul" card from your Deck to your hand. 
③：You can detach 1 material from this card, then target face-up cards on the field up to the number of face-down monsters your opponent controls; destroy them, and if you do, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent for each card destroyed.

name: Mimighoul Throne
desc:
2 Level 1 "Mimighoul" monsters
You can only use ① or ② effect of "Mimighoul Throne" per turn, and only once that turn.
①：You can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 "Mimighoul Master" from your hand, Deck or GY. 
②：During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Mimighoul Master" you control; equip this card to it as an Equip Spell that gives it 1000 ATK, then you can return cards from the field to the hand, up to the number of materials this card had.

name: Spoon, the Seal of Magistus
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can discard this card, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Add 1 "Magistus" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Spoon, the Seal of Magistus".
● The ATK of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls becomes halved until the end of this turn.
②：You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-up monster you control; equip 1 "Magistus" monster from your Extra Deck or GY to it.

name: Paladins of Bonds and Unity
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters with 2500 original ATK and DEF
①：This Synchro Summoned card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects, also your opponent cannot target it with card effects.
②：This Synchro Summoned card gains 100 ATK/DEF for each card on the field and in the GYs while you have 25 or more cards in your GY.
③：Once per turn, when a Spell Card is activated and your opponent has 25 or more cards in their GY (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

name: The Fabled Behillmoth
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is in your hand: You can discard 2 or more "Fabled" monsters, including this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Fabled" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck whose Level equals the discarded monsters' total original Levels. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.)
②：If a card(s) is sent from your hand to the GY while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 "Fabled" monster from your hand.

name: Fabled Gamygyn
desc:
1 "Fabled" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only use ① and ③ effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Fabled" monster from your hand or Deck.
②：Your opponent cannot target other "Fabled" Synchro Monsters you control with card effects.
③：If this card is sent to the GY: You can draw cards equal to the number of "Fabled" Synchro Monsters you control, then discard 1 card.

name: Fabledswarm Leverzebul
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can use only the ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：Once per turn, during the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Tribute any number of "Fabled" monsters, and if you do, take control of that many face-up monsters your opponent controls, but their effects are negated.
②：If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 other "Fabled" card in your GY; return this card to the Extra Deck, and if you do, add that target to your hand.

name: Fabled Realm Resurrection
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：When this card resolves, you can Set 1 "Fabled" Spell/Trap from your Deck, except "Fabled Realm Resurrection".
②：Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects when your "Fabled" monster is Synchro Summoned.
③：Once per turn: You can discard 1 "Fabled" card, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Draw 1 card.
● Special Summon 1 "Fabled" monster from your GY or banishment.

name: Jurrac Megalo
desc:
You can only use ①, ② and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control a Dinosaur monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：During your Main Phase: You can discard 2 cards, including a "Jurrac" card, then draw 2 cards.
③：If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can send 1 "Jurrac" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck to the GY, except "Jurrac Megalo".

name: Jurrac Stigo
desc:
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can destroy 1 card you control, and if you do, send 1 Dinosaur monster from your Deck to the GY, then you can Special Summon any number of "Jurrac" monsters from your hand and/or Deck whose total Levels equal the sent monster's Level, ignoring their Summoning conditions, except "Jurrac Stigo", also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Dinosaur monsters.
②：When this card is destroyed by battle: You can return 1 card on the field to the hand.

name: Jurrac Astero
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Dinosaur monsters
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Set 1 "Jurrac" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY.
②：Once per turn, if your opponent would Special Summon a monster(s) (Quick Effect): You can banish 2 Dinosaur monsters from your GY; negate the Summon, and if you do, destroy that monster(s).
③：During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 2 "Jurrac" monsters from your GY, including this card; Special Summon 1 "Jurrac Meteor" from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.)

name: Jurrac Volcano
desc:
You can only use ①, ② and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can destroy 1 Dinosaur monster you control, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Jurrac" monster from your Deck.
②：If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) during the turn they activated monster effects 4 or more times: You can Special Summon 1 "Jurrac Meteor" from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.)
③：If a "Jurrac" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by card effect, you can banish 1 Dinosaur monster from your GY instead.

name: Crystron Tristalos
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Crystron" monster from your Deck, except "Crystron Tristalos", then, immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Machine monster using that monster you control.
②：You can banish this card from your GY; destroy 1 Synchro Monster you control, then Special Summon 2 "Crystron" monsters from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Machine monsters.

name: Crystron Sulfudhole
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①： If this card is in your hand or GY: You can target 1 "Crystron" card you control; destroy it, then Special Summon this card, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Machine monsters.
②： If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send up to 2 "Crystron" cards with different names from your Deck to the GY, except "Crystron Sulfudhole".

name: Crystron Eleskeletas
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non Tuner monsters
You can only use ① and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "Crystron" card from your GY or banishment to your hand.
②：Monsters your opponent controls lose 500 ATK/DEF.
③：If this Synchro Summoned card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Crystron" monster from your GY or banishment.

name: Crystron Inclusion
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn. 
You can only use ③ effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：When this card resolves, you can add 1 "Crystron" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Crystron Inclusion".
②：The first time each of your "Crystron" monsters would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed.
③：You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Crystron" monster in your GY; Special Summon it.

name: Crystron Cluster
desc:
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①："Crystron" cards you control cannot be banished by your opponent's card effects.
②：You can target 1 face-up card on the field, or up to 2 if you control a "Crystron" Synchro Monster; shuffle 1 "Crystron" card from your GY or banishment into the Deck, except "Crystron Cluster", and if you do, destroy the targeted cards.

name: ARG☆S – Adra the Laurels
desc:
You can only use ③ effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：During your opponent's turn, if you control a Continuous Trap (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your hand; change the ATK of 1 face-up monster on the field to 0 until the end of this turn.
②：If this card is Normal Summoned: Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of your Continuous Trap Cards and their effects for the rest of this turn.
③：You can banish this card you control; place up to 2 "ARG☆S" Continuous Traps with different names from your hand and/or Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: ARG☆S – Home Stadium
desc:
①：Once per turn: You can pay 1000 LP; add 1 "ARG☆S" card from your GY or banishment to your hand.
②：Each time a Continuous Trap(s) is Special Summoned from the Spell & Trap Zone to your field, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.
③：Once per Chain, if your Continuous Trap Card activates its effect in the Monster Zone while you have a banished "ARG☆S" monster: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn.

name: ARG☆S – Tydel the Purple Lightning
desc:
①：Warrior monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF.
②：Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Warrior/LIGHT/Level 4/ATK 2000/DEF 2000) with the following effect (it is also still a Trap), then you can add 1 "ARG☆S" card from your Deck to your hand, except "ARG☆S – Tydel the Purple Lightning".
● Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone face-up.

name: ARG☆S – Capane the Flying Swallow
desc:
①：Your Warrior monsters cannot be destroyed by battle.
②：Once per turn, if there is a Continuous Trap in the Monster Zone: You can Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Warrior/LIGHT/Level 4/ATK 1800/DEF 1800) with the following effect (it is also still a Trap), then, if you have any banished "ARG☆S" monster(s), gain 500 LP.
● Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone face-up.

name: ARG☆S – Eteo the Dragon Slayer
desc:
①：Warrior monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects.
②：Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect: You can Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Warrior/LIGHT/Level 4/ATK 800/DEF 800) with the following effect (it is also still a Trap), then, if you have any banished "ARG☆S" monster(s), you can return 1 card on the field to the hand.
● Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone face-up.

name: Mimighoul Fork
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card once per turn.
①：Target a face down monster your opponent controls; your opponent choose 1 of the following effects, and you apply that effect:
●Change it to face up attack or defense position.
●Send it to the graveyard, and then the owner of that monster draw 2 cards.
②：You can banish this card from your graveyard; add to your hand 1 "Mimighoul Fork" from your deck.

name: Speedroid Clackernel
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 8
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use ① Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can banish 1 "Speedroid" card from your GY; place 1 "Speedroid" Pendululm Monster from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except WIND monsters.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can only use ① and ② monster effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card on the field is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Speedroid Clackernel" from your hand, Deck, or GY, and if you do, it is treated as a Tuner.
②：If your "Clear Wing" monster battles while this card is face-up in your Extra Deck, during damage calculation: You can banish this card, and if you do, that monster gains 700 ATK.

name: Speedroid Wing Synchron
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 4
[ Pendulum Effect ]
①：Once per turn: You can destroy both this card and 1 Level 2 WIND Pendulum Monster Card in your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Clear Wing Synchro Dragon" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon), also, for the rest of this turn, cards in your Pendulum Zone cannot be destroyed by card effects, also you cannot Special Summon monsters, except WIND monsters.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can only use monster effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is added to the Extra Deck face-up and there are 2 or more different Monster Types among the WIND Synchro Monsters you control: You can send 1 "Speedroid" Spell/Trap from your Deck to the GY.

name: Crystal Clear Wing Over Synchro Dragon
desc:
2+ Tuners or 1 Tuner Synchro Monster + "Clear Wing Synchro Dragon"
Must be Synchro Summoned.
①：Once per turn, when another card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card, and if it was a monster, this card gains ATK equal to that monster's original ATK until the end of this turn.
②：If this face-up Synchro Summoned card leaves the field by your opponent: You can Special Summon 1 "Clear Wing" monster from your Extra Deck.

name: Hi-Speedroid Glider 2
desc:
1 WIND Machine Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 non-Tuner Level 7 or lower WIND Synchro Monster in your GY; Special Summon it.
②：If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) and you control a "Clear Wing" monster: You can banish this card from your GY; increase the Levels of all face-up monsters your opponent currently controls by 5.

name: Speedroid Clear Wing Wander
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Target cards your opponent controls up to the number of different Monster Types among the WIND Synchro Monsters you control; destroy them.
②：If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 WIND Synchro Monster you control; banish it, then return it to the field.

name: Mimighoul Charm
desc:
You can only use ① effect of this card's name twice per turn.
①：Once per Chain, during the Main Phase, if a "Mimighoul" monster your opponent controls is flipped face-up: You can randomly choose 1 face-down card in your opponent's Extra Deck, and if it is a monster that can be Special Summoned, Special Summon it to your field, but it cannot activate its effects this turn.
If it wasn't, or couldn't be Special Summoned, banish that card.

name: Evil HERO Toxic Bubble
desc:
You can only Special Summon with the ① method of this card's name once per turn.
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can Special Summon this card (from your hand).
If Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except "HERO" monsters.
②：If this card is Special Summoned and you control a Fusion Monster that must be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion": You can draw 2 cards.

name: Evil HERO Doom Prison
desc:
You can only Special Summon with the ① method of this card's name once per turn.
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If you control a Fusion Monster that must be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).
②：You can send 1 "HERO" monster from your Deck to the GY; if you Fusion Summon a "HERO" monster this turn, this face-up card can be used as a substitute for any 1 Fusion Material whose name is mentioned on it, but the other materials must be correct.

name: Evil HERO Infernal Rider
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Dark Fusion" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
②：You can banish this card and 4 other monsters from your GY; Set 1 "Super Polymerization" from your Deck, also, until the end of your opponent's turn, you cannot Special Summon, except "HERO" monsters, but you can Fusion Summon Fusion Monsters that must be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion", with effects other than it.

name: Evil HERO Neos Lord
desc:
"Elemental HERO Neos" or 1 Fusion Monster that mentions it + 1 Effect Monster on the field
Must be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion".
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned, OR if a monster(s) is sent to your opponent's GY while this monster is on the field: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of it.
②：Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.

name: Evil HERO Inferno Wing – Infernal Backlash
desc:
"Elemental HERO Avian" or "Elemental HERO Burstinatrix" + 1 "HERO" monster
Must be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion".
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Dark Fusion" or 1 card that mentions it from your Deck or GY to your hand, except a Fusion Monster.
②：If your "HERO" monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Inflict 2100 damage to them.

name: Evil HERO Dark Knight
desc:
1 Fiend monster + 1 Warrior monster
Must be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion".
①：Monsters your opponent controls lose ATK equal to the total original ATK of the Fusion Materials used for this card's Summon.
②：Can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.
③：If this face-up Special Summoned card you control leaves the field by your opponent: You can target 1 Fiend or Warrior monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position.

name: Dark Contact
desc:
①：Activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of this card's name once per turn);
● Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster that must be Special Summoned with "Dark Fusion" from your Extra Deck, by shuffling its materials from your field, GY, and/or banishment into the Deck.
(This is treated as a Fusion Summon with "Dark Fusion".)
● Add 1 "Supreme King's Castle" or "Dark Fusion" from your Deck to your hand.

name: Evil Assault
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Discard 1 card; you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, except "HERO" monsters, also take 1 Level 4 or lower "Evil HERO" monster from your Deck, and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it.
②：If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish it; add 1 "Dark Fusion" from your GY to your hand.

name: Dark Supremacy
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Target face-up cards your opponent controls up to the number of "Dark Fusion" and Spells that mention it in your GY; negate their effects until the end of this turn.
②：If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish it, then target up to 5 "HERO" monsters in your GY and/or banishment; shuffle them into the Deck.

name: Odd-Eyes Solblaze Dragon
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can use only one effect among the ① and ② effects with this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck.
You cannot Special Summon while you control that face-up monster, except Pendulum Monsters.
②：If this card is in your GY: You can banish 2 other Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, and/or Pendulum Monsters from your GY; Special Summon this card.

name: Mimighoul Armor
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of "Mimighoul Armor" once per turn.
①：FLIP: If it is the Main Phase: Apply these effects in sequence.
• This turn, "Mimighoul" monsters cannot be destroyed by battle.
• Give control of this card to your opponent.
②：During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand to your opponent's field in face-down Defense Position, or if your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon this card face-up on your field.

name: Space Omajinai Usagi
desc:
A mysterious visitor from the heavens. She converts people's sense of pain into signals and sends them into space, but why she does so is still unknown to this day.
—- "Pain, pain, go away, go away"
